title.rendered: Life Science Jobs Survey: We Want Your Opinion!

content.rendered:
Work in biotech/life sciences? Got a few minutes to share your opinion in our annual survey?

???? https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/P3JGLPT

We’re gathering information to better understand how job hunting and employment in the life science market have changed in 2020. Please add your voice! Share your input and get a copy of our final year-end report later this year.

 

Thank you in advance!
